thread.section_title: Brian Gavin Diamonds Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brian Gavin Diamonds | briangavindiamonds.com
thread.title: Shelley Watson
thread.title_full: Brian Gavin Diamonds reviewed by Shelley Watson

author: Shelley Watson
title: Shelley Watson
text: I have been a long time customer of Brian Gavin. My most recent purchase was a pair of diamond stud earrings. They weren't large diamonds, in fact they were on the smaller side. I still received the same quality of service that I did when buying larger diamonds. The workmanship is just stunning and the diamonds are perfect. I would not hesitate to recommend Brian Gavin Diamonds to anyone.
